gistdex.description: Gistdex MCP Server - RAG search system for Gist, GitHub, and local files. The database will be created in the current working directory. Specify 'cwd' field to set custom database location.

gistdex-npx.description: Gistdex MCP Server (using npx) - Works the same as pnpm dlx, directly executing the package with --mcp flag.

gistdex-local.description: Local development test - runs built version from project directory
